content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I'm looking forward to discussing the rental price of this lovely apartment. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I appreciate the opportunity to negotiate the price of this apartment. I'm looking to pay a fair and reasonable amount, considering the size of the apartment and the location. Would you be willing to start at a lower price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Max. I'm open to considering a lower price. What amount did you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I was thinking of something around 650 Euro per month, all-inclusive. I believe this would be a fair price, considering the size and the amenities provided. What do you think?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your offer of 650 Euro per month all-inclusive is quite generous. However, I must admit that it's lower than what I had initially hoped for. I'm looking for a price that reflects the true value of the apartment. Would you be willing to increase your offer slightly?
name: Heinrich Heine
